name: Mel Odius Goes Six String Searchin'
name_original: Mel Odius Goes Six String Searchin'
description:
Mel Odius Goes Six String Searchin' is an adventure game developed by Worwyk Software. It came out on 01-01-1992. Worwyk Software published the game.
You can play Mel Odius Goes Six String Searchin' on PC.
